thread.section_title: Sunworld Dynasty Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Convenience & Comfort
thread.title_full: Convenience & Comfort - Review of Sunworld Dynasty Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Lawrence9999
title: Convenience & Comfort
text:
Stayed at this place during my visit to Beijing. The bed is comfortable for my standard. Hotel water pressure is fantastic because they were running full house.
Breakfast is alright though with a blend of east and west but definitely cannot be compared to the 5-star international hotel brands.
It is within walking distance to Wangfujing shopping street where food is plenty. Late hours food can be a bit challenging except for McDonald's and KFC. There is a mall named AMPM which closes about 11pm.
Overall, a yes.
